name: Ixmail
body:
# IxMail ASP.NET Templating Email ## Requirement .Net 4 or later ## Install using package manager console visual studio PM> Install-Package IxMail after installation you will see you `web.config` change like this : and change with your account. ```c# ``` Now add this class, wich this class will become your object to send your mail ``` // public class IxMailTes { public string Name { get; set; } public string UserName { get; set; } public bool IsActive { get; set; } } ``` and run this code below : ``` IxMailTes imt = new IxMailTes(); imt.Name = "My Name"; imt.UserName = "My User Name"; imt.IsActive = true; IxWebMail IWW = new IxWebMail(); IWW.BuildBody(imt, "yourtemplate") .EmailTo("yourmail") .EmailSubject("Activation") .Send(); ``` there is 2 options method to send 1. You can send it live with `.Send()`. 2. Or you can send it as background process, this will be improve, when your application with big transaction `SendBackground()`. After you run all above, you will be see hidden directory in your project, directory address is **/Views/IxMail**, and you can add your template there. example tamplate with html/txt ``` Hallo {{Name}}
Your user name is {{UserName}}
You ar also {{IsActive}} Visit ``` separator of `{{Your Object}}` would be replaced
